Hospital.Controllers
Class PatientController

java.lang.Object
  Hospital.Controllers.PatientController

public class PatientController
extends Object

Used for patient-related actions that are handled by a nurse

registerPatient

public String registerPatient(String factoryName,
                              PublicArgument[] args)
                       throws ArgumentConstraintException,
                              NotLoggedInException,
                              NotAFactoryException,
                              SchedulableAlreadyExistsException,
                              WrongArgumentListException,
                              ArgumentNotAnsweredException,
                              ArgumentIsNullException
This creates a new Patient and adds it to the hospital.

Parameters:
factoryName - The factoryName to add a person with.
args - The name of the patient in a StringArgument.
Returns:
The name of the patient that was made.
Throws:
ArgumentConstraintException - If the name did not satisfy the constraints.
NotLoggedInException - If the nurse was logged out.
NotAFactoryException - If the factory's name was not found.
SchedulableAlreadyExistsException - If the patient already existed.
WrongArgumentListException - If the length was wrong.
ArgumentNotAnsweredException - If the name was not entered in the argument.
ArgumentIsNullException - If the argumentList or one of it's elements is null.

getAvailableFactories

public String[] getAvailableFactories()
                               throws NotLoggedInException
Returns the names of all factories that makes patients.

Returns:
Array of names of the factories.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - If the nurse was logged out.

getFactoryArguments

public PublicArgument[] getFactoryArguments(String factoryName)
                                     throws NotLoggedInException,
                                            NotAFactoryException
Returns the arguments of the chosen factory that makes patients.

Parameters:
factoryName - The name of the factory to search the arguments of.
Returns:
The arguments.
Throws:
NotLoggedInException - If the nurse was logged out.
NotAFactoryException - If the factory was not found.
